doc.title: Martin Rowson on Greece and Italy's troubles - cartoon
doc.author: Martin Rowson
doc.description: George Papandreou has been forced out, Silvio Berlusconi looks likely to follow and the markets have taken a battering

main.p: Martin Rowson on Greece and Italy's troubles - cartoonGeorge Papandreou has been forced out, Silvio Berlusconi looks likely to follow and the markets have taken a battering Martin Rowson cartoon, 12.11.2011.
